title: Our Rooms
subtitle: Stay comfortably at our hotel located by the sea in Mollösund
intro: Feel good and sleep well in one of our ten tastefully decorated rooms. Wake up to an unbeatable view and enjoy a good breakfast on our terrace.
history: Wärds Mollösund came into being in the 1850s and was then called "Gäschivan", all rooms look different with their own charm.
location: The hotel is located in the heart of Mollösund with a few meters down to the harbor.
noTV: We have chosen not to have TV in our rooms to create a calm and relaxing environment.

breakfast.title: Breakfast Information
breakfast.note: Please note that during low season, breakfast is served as a breakfast package instead of a buffet.
breakfast.dates: These dates breakfast packages are served:
breakfast.period2: And during weekdays March 29 - June 21 & September 1 - September 29
breakfast.groups: If you are a larger group, it is possible to open the entire hotel for both breakfast and dinner.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.email: If you have questions, contact us at hotell@wards.se
